title: anyone here know catraven?
body:
As The Sheriff of NA gd I require they're assistance in this  currently ongoing investigation. They use the NA gd often and they're currently have some sort of lynch mob going on.

http://i.imgur.com/dCrbz4p.jpg

I need to know if they've received any bans the past couple days as proof. Does anyone here know them or know if they come here often and will see this?
